message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can't have all the fun, I'll give you 40% and take 60%!
I'll give you a better deal, 30% for me and 70% for you. Don't miss out!
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a quarter, but don't think you're getting the better deal!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, 22% for me and 78% for you. It's still a good offer, don't pass it up!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a pittance, but it's better than nothing!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, 18% for me and 82% for you. It's getting late, don't miss this chance!
You're running out of time, I'll give you a tiny bit, but it's getting close to nothing!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, 12% for me and 88% for you. It's getting desperate, but I'm still willing to negotiate!
You're almost out of time, I'll give you a tiny fraction, but it's almost nothing!
I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm not giving up yet! 8% for me and 92% for you. It's almost the end, but I'm still fighting!
It's the last chance, take it or leave it! I'm taking 99% of the remaining money, you get the rest.
